CHALLENGE

Lead UX/UI design of the portal



PROJECT DESCRIPTION

myabiportal.com is a B2B e-commerce & services portal which brings AB InBev's Europe zone customers online! Users can easily order beer and other products, manage financials (invoices, payments and bonuses etc.) and get help on any other question. Biggest beer brands collection and smooth UX on the portal makes it great tool for the business owners and managers.



DESIGN PROCESS

Task-Request - Research - Ideation - Prototype - Review - Polish - QA - (Deploy) - Analyze


Design process is a non liner process. It is iterative and really agile.




WHAT'VE BEEN DONE

In 2021, my first year on the project, as the only UX/UI designer I worked in few directions:

- bring consystency into UI/UX, create a Design System and apply common UX patterns;

- design new features' UI & UX and improve existing ones;

- create a unique Design Process which perfectly integrates into the general development process.
